prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Summarized Context:
The witness Ema explains the police's suspicion towards Dr. Buff the defendant.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: A particular set of circumstances led to her being adopted by Mr. Wright. A world-class magician on the rise.
Character 1
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The youngest lawyer in our agency. She apparently studied psychology in Europe.
Character 2
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: My boss. He taught me a lot about what it means to be a lawyer.
Character 3
Name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
Description: A prosecutor from Khura'in. He's also a monk, which explains why he's known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."
Character 4
Name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
Description: Leader of the Defiant Dragons, and the man who raised me. He was a lawyer once.
Character 5
Name: Archie Buff
Description: An archeologist in Kurain Village. He was asked by someone to study the Founder's Orb.
Character 6
Name: Datz Are'bal
Description: A member of the Defiant Dragons, and Dhurke's right-hand man. He's always been one to laugh at just about anything.
Character 7
Name: Ema Skye
Description: A detective. It looks like she finally became the forensics investigator she always wanted to be.
Character 8
Name: Paul Atishon
Description: He's looking to represent Kurain Village. His remarkable self-confidence is blinding.
Character 9
Name: Sergeant Buff → Armie Buff
Description: The doctor's reclusive child. He lost his mother in a fire.
Character 10
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Ms. Maya Fey's cousin. She's also one of Kurain Village's spirit mediums. She's always really courteous.
Character 11
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: Mr. Wright's best friend and the district's chief prosecutor. His frilly cravat makes a strong fashion statement.
Character 12
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mr. Wright's former assistant. She's currently training in Khura'in. I'm told she can channel the dead.
Character 13
Name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
Description: Khura'in's Minister of Justice and the kingdom's second-in-command.
Character 14
Name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
Description: Daughter of Ga'ran and princess of Khura'in who is more than a little spoiled.
Character 15
Name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.
Character 16
Name: Nayna
Description: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.
Character 17
Name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Description: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.
Character 18
Name: Amara Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The previous queen. She is a spirit medium known as the grand priestess and possesses incredible spiritual power.
Character 19
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: An aspiring magician and my daughter. I adopted her nine years ago.
Character 20
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The newest lawyer in my office with a background in psychology.
Character 21
Name: Apollo Justice
Description: A reliable subordinate at my office. Serious and hot-blooded with vocal chords made of steel.
Character 22
Name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
Description: A Khura'inese prosecutor and monk. He's also known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."
Character 23
Name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
Description: Leader of the Defiant Dragons and Apollo's adoptive father.
Character 24
Name: Datz Are'bal
Description: The Defiant Dragons' XO and Dhurke's right-hand man. He will laugh at just about anything.
Character 25
Name: Ema Skye
Description: A detective with a love of science. She's finally achieved her dream of becoming a forensics investigator.
Character 26
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: The district's chief prosecutor and my childhood friend. We used to go head-to-head back in his courtroom days.
Character 27
Name: Maya Fey
Description: A practitioner of the Kurain Channeling Technique. We used to take on all sorts of cases together.
Character 28
Name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
Description: Khura'in's Minister of Justice. He was killed during the hostage exchange.
Character 29
Name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
Description: A Khura'inist priestess and crown princess of Khura'in. Her Divination Séances show the last memories of the dead.
Character 30
Name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.
Character 31
Name: Nayna
Description: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.
Character 32
Name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Description: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: My beloved attorney's badge. Wearing it gets me raring to go.
Evidence 1
Name: Founder's Orb
Description: A national treasure of the Kingdom of Khura'in. None but those of in the royal family have laid eyes on it. Heating the Founder's Orb revealed the statue within. The founder's form has appeared from within. It seems only the queen knows the founder's real name.
Evidence 2
Name: Photo of My Father
Description: A picture of my biological father, Jove Justice, who died in Khura'in.
Evidence 3
Name: Study Photo
Description: Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder. One of the books is stained with coffee. [caption] The victim is lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass. He is covered by books.
Evidence 4
Name: Study Diagram
Description: A diagram of the doctors's study. Note the bookcase, large window, and second-floor area. [caption] There is a tree outside the large floor-to-ceiling window. On the other side of the window is the bookshelf.
Evidence 5
Name: Research Notes
Description: Research notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box containing the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 6
Name: Orb Transfer Agreement
Description: States: "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm."
Evidence 7
Name: Sarge's Drone
Description: A helicopter drone operated by the doctor's kid. Equipped with a camera and a microphone.
Evidence 8
Name: Glowing Moss
Description: Stuck to the insole of the doctor's boot. It probably got there when he went to hide the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 9
Name: E-Mail
Description: Data obtained from the doctor's computer. Includes a report on his research into the Founder's Orb. Found on the computer in Archie Buff's study, it was sent from Buff to "PAW-711@nmail" as a reply to an earlier email concerning his research into the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 10
Name: Doctor's Reading Glasses
Description: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.
Evidence 11
Name: Raincoat
Description: Seems the doctor wore this last night. Bears a distinctive yellow and green two-tone design.
Evidence 12
Name: Robbery Report
Description: A report filed a year ago by one Mr. Paul Atishon-Wimperson for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey.
Evidence 13
Name: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report
Description: Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object. The time of death is between 10 and 11 PM.
Evidence 14
Name: Armie's Statement
Description: She'd fled to her room when she realized someone had moved her while she'd been unconscious on the second floor.
Evidence 15
Name: Inga's Autopsy Report
Description: Stabbed from behind. Cause of death is blood loss. Time of death is approximately 3 PM.
Evidence 16
Name: Tomb Diagram
Description: A diagram of the crime scene. Amara's sarcophagus is in the very center of the room.
Evidence 17
Name: Tomb Crime Photo
Description: A photo of Inga's body. He was stabbed in the back with a knife.
Evidence 18
Name: Gemstone
Description: Inga's button, discovered in the ashes of the tomb's incense burners. Caked in soot.
Evidence 19
Name: Pink Butterfly Pendant
Description: A pendant adorned with a pink butterfly. Seems it belongs to Dhurke. Stained with the victim's blood. A locket found at the crime scene. It actually belongs to Amara.
Evidence 20
Name: Mysterious Bloodstain
Description: A bloodstain from Amara's Tomb. Analysis reveals that it's Dhurke's blood.
Evidence 21
Name: Painkiller Shots
Description: The medication Inga used for his back pain. Said to make the pain disappear.
Evidence 22
Name: Inga's Notepad
Description: A notepad used by Inga. People's characteristics are written inside.
Evidence 23
Name: Woman's Photo
Description: A photo showing Dhurke and Amara's life on the run about 23 years ago.
Evidence 24
Name: Channeling Photo
Description: A picture taken at around 2 PM of the channeling rite.
Evidence 25
Name: Ahlbi's Statement
Description: At around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
Evidence 26
Name: Amara's Assassination File
Description: A file containing a ton of info on the assassination of Amara Sigatar Khura'in.
Evidence 27
Name: Dhurke's Law Book
Description: A document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the name of the queen.
Evidence 28
Name: Dhurke's Badge
Description: The symbol of Dhurke's creed: "A dragon never yields." Nahyuta never confiscated it.
Evidence 29
Name: Dhurke's Corpse Photo
Description: More than three days have passed since his death death. He was shot three times in the chest.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: The police have had their eye on Dr. Buff for some time.
Person: Ema
Testimony 1
Testimony: And just today, a number of stolen artifacts were discovered in his study.
Person: Ema
Testimony 2
Testimony: Among them were a priceless urn and a statue that were stolen from the Fey clan.
Person: Ema
Testimony 3
Testimony: It seems the doctor would do anything to study artifacts, including steal them.
Person: Ema
Testimony 4
Testimony: As for the relic at the center of this dispute, he likely stole it from the Atishon residence.
Person: Ema

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
response:
Okay, let's try to figure out which evidence and testimony contradict each other here. The user wants me to find one pair where the evidence directly contradicts a testimony. Let me start by going through each testimony and checking the related evidence.

First, looking at the testimonies given by Ema. Testimony 0 says the police have had their eye on Dr. Buff. Testimony 1 mentions stolen artifacts found in his study today. Testimony 2 specifies they include an urn and statue from the Fey clan. Testimony 3 claims he'd do anything to study artifacts, including stealing. Testimony 4 suggests he stole the relic from Atishon's residence.

Now, looking at the evidence list. Let's check each testimony against the evidence. For Testimony 4, Ema says Dr. Buff stole the relic from Atishon. But looking at Evidence 12, which is a robbery report filed by Paul Atishon for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey a year ago. Wait, Evidence 12 is about a different stolen item—Crystal of Ami Fey, not the Founder's Orb or the artifacts mentioned in the testimonies. However, Testimony 4 says the relic in question (probably the Founder's Orb) was stolen from Atishon's residence. But Evidence 12 is about Atishon reporting a theft of another item. If Dr. Buff is suspected of stealing the Founder's Orb from Atishon's residence, but the robbery report is about Atishon himself being a victim of theft, maybe there's a contradiction here. Because if Atishon reported a theft, maybe the Founder's Orb wasn't stolen from him but someone else, or maybe Dr. Buff isn't connected to that particular theft. Alternatively, Evidence 12 could imply that Atishon is the one who had something stolen, so if Ema claims Dr. Buff stole the relic from Atishon, but the report is by Atishon, maybe there's a contradiction. Hmm. Let me check the other evidence.

Evidence 6 is the Orb Transfer Agreement, which says Buff agreed to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if he comes to no harm. But how does that relate to Testimony 4? Testimony 4 is about stealing from Atishon. Evidence 12 is a robbery report by Atishon. So if Ema's testimony says Buff stole the relic from Atishon's residence, but the robbery report (Evidence 12) was filed by Atishon for a different item (Crystal of Ami Fey), that might not directly contradict. Unless the Founder's Orb is the same as the Crystal, but from the descriptions, the Founder's Orb is a different artifact. The Founder's Orb is a Khura'in national treasure (Evidence 1), while the Crystal of Ami Fey is related to the Fey clan (Evidence 12). So Testimony 4 (about stealing the relic from Atishon) would refer to the Founder's Orb. But the Orb Transfer Agreement (Evidence 6) shows Buff was supposed to hand over the Orb to the Defiant Dragons. If Buff stole the Orb from Atishon, but there's an agreement that Buff would transfer it to the Defiant Dragons, maybe that's a possible contradiction. However, the agreement might just indicate his intent, not necessarily the source.

Wait, Testimony 2 says the stolen artifacts include the urn and statue from the Fey clan. Evidence 12 is a report by Atishon about the Crystal of Ami Fey being stolen. So if the stolen items in Buff's study (Testimony 2) include Fey clan artifacts, and Evidence 12 is a report by Atishon about a stolen Fey artifact, that could link Buff to that theft. But Testimony 4 says he stole the relic (Founder's Orb) from Atishon. But maybe the Founder's Orb isn't from Atishon. Alternatively, maybe the Orb Transfer Agreement (Evidence 6) shows that Buff had the Orb through an agreement, not theft. If the agreement says he would transfer the Orb if he's safe, then perhaps he obtained it legally or through some deal, contradicting Testimony 4's claim that he stole it from Atishon. So Evidence 6 (Orb Transfer Agreement) could contradict Testimony 4 (stole the relic from Atishon). Because the agreement implies he had the Orb and was to transfer it, not that he stole it from Atishon.

Alternatively, looking at Testimony 3, which says Buff would steal to study artifacts. But Evidence 5 (Research Notes) and Evidence 9 (Email) might show he was conducting research. However, unless the evidence directly shows he didn't need to steal, which it doesn't. So maybe another angle.

Evidence 7 is Sarge's Drone with camera and mic. Maybe that could relate to Testimony 4 if the drone recorded something, but not sure.

Wait, Testimony 4 says "the relic at the center of this dispute, he likely stole it from the Atishon residence." The relic here is the Founder's Orb (since that's the main artifact in the case). If the Orb Transfer Agreement (Evidence 6) states that Buff agreed to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if he comes to no harm, that suggests that Buff had possession of the Orb through some agreement, not necessarily theft. So if Ema's Testimony 4 claims he stole it from Atishon, but the agreement (Evidence 6) indicates he was supposed to transfer it, that could be a contradiction. Because if he had an agreement to transfer it, maybe he obtained it legitimately from someone else, not stealing from Atishon. Therefore, Evidence 6 contradicts Testimony 4.

But wait, the agreement is from Buff to the Defiant Dragons. It says "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm." So Buff is the one agreeing to transfer the Orb. This suggests that Buff already has possession of the Orb. But how did he get it? If he stole it from Atishon (Testimony 4), that's possible. But maybe if there's evidence that he obtained it through another means. Alternatively, if the Orb was supposed to be in Atishon's possession, but the agreement shows Buff had it, then Testimony 4's claim that he stole it from Atishon might be contradicted if there's evidence that Atishon didn't have it. Wait, Evidence 12 is a robbery report by Atishon for the Crystal of Ami Fey. That's a different item. So maybe Atishon's residence was the target for another theft, but the Founder's Orb is a Khura'in treasure. So perhaps the Founder's Orb wasn't in Atishon's possession. Therefore, Testimony 4's claim that Buff stole the Orb from Atishon's residence would be contradicted if the Orb wasn't there. But how do we know where the Orb was? Evidence 1 says the Founder's Orb is a Khura'in national treasure, and only the royal family has seen it. So if that's the case, then Atishon wouldn't have it. Therefore, Testimony 4's assertion that Buff stole the Orb from Atishon's residence is contradicted by Evidence 1, which states the Orb was a Khura'in treasure not seen by anyone outside the royal family. Therefore, Atishon couldn't have had it in his residence for Buff to steal. So Evidence 1 (Founder's Orb description) contradicts Testimony 4 (stole from Atishon). That's a possible contradiction.

So Evidence 1 says the Founder's Orb is a national treasure of Khura'in, and only the royal family has laid eyes on it. Testimony 4 says Buff stole it from Atishon's residence. But Atishon is not part of the Khura'in royal family (he's Paul Atishon, looking to represent Kurain Village). Therefore, how could the Orb be in Atishon's residence if only the royal family has seen it? That's a contradiction. So if the Orb was in Atishon's residence, that would mean Atishon had it, which contradicts Evidence 1's statement. Therefore, Testimony 4's claim that Buff stole the Orb from Atishon's residence is contradicted by Evidence 1, which establishes that only the royal family has seen it, implying Atishon couldn't have possessed it.

Therefore, the correct pair is Evidence 1 (Founder's Orb) and Testimony 4.

{"evidence": 1, "testimony": 4}

response:
Okay, let me try to work through this step by step. So the task is to find which evidence and testimony contradict each other. The user wants just one pair. Let's start by looking at the testimonies given by Atishon and the evidence provided.

First, let's list out Atishon's testimonies:

Testimony 0: He was walking alone, lost in thought that evening.
Testimony 1: He passed by the doctor's house and saw Datz Are'bal.
Testimony 2: He was under a tree when he saw Datz.
Testimony 3: Datz was running out the front door.
Testimony 4: He didn't know Dr. Buff was dead, so didn't call police.
Testimony 5: The time was around 10 PM, so Datz must have been fleeing the crime.
Testimony 6: His campaign promise about ending violence.

Now, the evidence. Let's see which ones relate to the time of death or the location where Atishon claims to have seen Datz.

Looking at the evidence list, Evidence 13 is Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report, which states the time of death between 10 and 11 PM. Testimony 5 by Atishon says he saw Datz fleeing around 10 PM, which aligns with the time of death. But wait, maybe there's something else.

Evidence 3 is the Study Photo, which mentions that Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene. The caption says the victim is in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass. The photo's description also notes a book stained with coffee. Then there's Evidence 4, the Study Diagram, which shows a tree outside the large window and a bookshelf on the other side.

Atishon's Testimony 2 says he was under the tree when he saw Datz. Testimony 3 says Datz was running out the front door. But the Study Diagram (Evidence 4) shows that the study has a large window with a tree outside. If Atishon was under the tree, he would be outside the window. Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: My beloved attorney's badge. Wearing it gets me raring to go.
Evidence 1
Name: Founder's Orb
Description: A national treasure of the Kingdom of Khura'in. None but those of in the royal family have laid eyes on it. Heating the Founder's Orb revealed the statue within. The founder's form has appeared from within. It seems only the queen knows the founder's real name.
Evidence 2
Name: Photo of My Father
Description: A picture of my biological father, Jove Justice, who died in Khura'in.
Evidence 3
Name: Study Photo
Description: Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder. One of the books is stained with coffee. [caption] The victim is lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass. He is covered by books.
Evidence 4
Name: Study Diagram
Description: A diagram of the doctors's study. Note the bookcase, large window, and second-floor area. [caption] There is a tree outside the large floor-to-ceiling window. On the other side of the window is the bookshelf.
Evidence 5
Name: Research Notes
Description: Research notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box containing the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 6
Name: Orb Transfer Agreement
Description: States: "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm."
Evidence 7
Name: Sarge's Drone
Description: A helicopter drone operated by the doctor's kid. Equipped with a camera and a microphone.
Evidence 8
Name: Glowing Moss
Description: Stuck to the insole of the doctor's boot. It probably got there when he went to hide the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 9
Name: E-Mail
Description: Data obtained from the doctor's computer. Includes a report on his research into the Founder's Orb. Found on the computer in Archie Buff's study, it was sent from Buff to "PAW-711@nmail" as a reply to an earlier email concerning his research into the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 10
Name: Doctor's Reading Glasses
Description: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.
Evidence 11
Name: Raincoat
Description: Seems the doctor wore this last night. Bears a distinctive yellow and green two-tone design.
Evidence 12
Name: Robbery Report
Description: A report filed a year ago by one Mr. Paul Atishon-Wimperson for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey.
Evidence 13
Name: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report
Description: Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object. The time of death is between 10 and 11 PM.
Evidence 14
Name: Armie's Statement
Description: She'd fled to her room when she realized someone had moved her while she'd been unconscious on the second floor.
Evidence 15
Name: Inga's Autopsy Report
Description: Stabbed from behind. Cause of death is blood loss. Time of death is approximately 3 PM.
Evidence 16
Name: Tomb Diagram
Description: A diagram of the crime scene. Amara's sarcophagus is in the very center of the room.
Evidence 17
Name: Tomb Crime Photo
Description: A photo of Inga's body. He was stabbed in the back with a knife.
Evidence 18
Name: Gemstone
Description: Inga's button, discovered in the ashes of the tomb's incense burners. Caked in soot.
Evidence 19
Name: Pink Butterfly Pendant
Description: A pendant adorned with a pink butterfly. Seems it belongs to Dhurke. Stained with the victim's blood. A locket found at the crime scene. It actually belongs to Amara.
Evidence 20
Name: Mysterious Bloodstain
Description: A bloodstain from Amara's Tomb. Analysis reveals that it's Dhurke's blood.
Evidence 21
Name: Painkiller Shots
Description: The medication Inga used for his back pain. Said to make the pain disappear.
Evidence 22
Name: Inga's Notepad
Description: A notepad used by Inga. People's characteristics are written inside.
Evidence 23
Name: Woman's Photo
Description: A photo showing Dhurke and Amara's life on the run about 23 years ago.
Evidence 24
Name: Channeling Photo
Description: A picture taken at around 2 PM of the channeling rite.
Evidence 25
Name: Ahlbi's Statement
Description: At around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
Evidence 26
Name: Amara's Assassination File
Description: A file containing a ton of info on the assassination of Amara Sigatar Khura'in.
Evidence 27
Name: Dhurke's Law Book
Description: A document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the name of the queen.
Evidence 28
Name: Dhurke's Badge
Description: The symbol of Dhurke's creed: "A dragon never yields." Nahyuta never confiscated it.
Evidence 29
Name: Dhurke's Corpse Photo
Description: More than three days have passed since his death death. He was shot three times in the chest.

Person: Sarge

Description: A diagram of the doctors's study. Note the bookcase, large window, and second-floor area. [caption] There is a tree outside the large floor-to-ceiling window. On the other side of the window is the bookshelf.
Evidence 5
Name: Research Notes
Description: Research notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box containing the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 6

Description: States: "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm."
Evidence 7

Description: A helicopter drone operated by the doctor's kid. Equipped with a camera and a microphone.
Evidence 8
Name: Glowing Moss
Description: Stuck to the insole of the doctor's boot. It probably got there when he went to hide the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 9

Description: Data obtained from the doctor's computer. Includes a report on his research into the Founder's Orb. Found on the computer in Archie Buff's study, it was sent from Buff to "PAW-711@nmail" as a reply to an earlier email concerning his research into the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 10

Description: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.

Description: Seems the doctor wore this last night. Bears a distinctive yellow and green two-tone design.
Evidence 12

Evidence 14

Description: She'd fled to her room when she realized someone had moved her while she'd been unconscious on the second floor.
Evidence 15

Description: Stabbed from behind. Cause of death is blood loss. Time of death is approximately 3 PM.
Evidence 16

Description: A diagram of the crime scene. Amara's sarcophagus is in the very center of the room.
Evidence 17

Evidence 18

Description: Inga's button, discovered in the ashes of the tomb's incense burners. Caked in soot.
Evidence 19

Description: A pendant adorned with a pink butterfly. Seems it belongs to Dhurke. Stained with the victim's blood. A locket found at the crime scene. It actually belongs to Amara.
Evidence 20
Name: Mysterious Bloodstain
Description: A bloodstain from Amara's Tomb. Analysis reveals that it's Dhurke's blood.
Evidence 21

Evidence 22

Evidence 23

Evidence 24

Description: At around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
Evidence 26

Description: A document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the name of the queen.
Evidence 28

Description: The symbol of Dhurke's creed: "A dragon never yields." Nahyuta never confiscated it.
Evidence 29

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: It was around 11 at night, and I was out on a mobile meet-and-greet around the village.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 1
Testimony: That's when I saw Dr. Buff being murdered from outside his study window!
Person: Atishon
Testimony 2
Testimony: Mr. Are'bal snuck up from behind and struck him on the head.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 3
Testimony: The doctor was standing in front of the bookshelves, absorbed in a book.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 4
Testimony: His weapon of choice: a suitcase.
Person: Atishon
Testimony 5
Testimony: A big, strong man like him could easily swing a heavy suitcase into someone's head.
Person: Atishon

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
response:
Okay, let's see. The user wants me to find which evidence and testimony contradict each other. The context is from a legal case with various characters, evidences, and testimonies. The task is to find one pair where the evidence directly contradicts a testimony.

First, let's look at the testimonies. The testimonies are all from Atishon (Testimony 0 to 5). Testimony 3 says that Dr. Buff was standing in front of the bookshelves, absorbed in a book when he was attacked. 

Now, checking the evidences. Evidence 10 is the Doctor's Reading Glasses, found on his desk. If the doctor was reading a book at the bookshelf when he was killed, he would need his reading glasses. But if his glasses were found on the desk, that implies he wasn't wearing them at the time. Since he couldn't read without them (as per the description of Evidence 10), he couldn't have been absorbed in a book. So Testimony 3 contradicts Evidence 10 because if he was reading, he would have his glasses on, but they were found on the desk instead.

{"evidence": 10, "testimony": 3}
